Class ThreadCheckArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • ThreadCheckArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ThreadCheckArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    galmu the runnable class which runs the threads. the recursive search is implemented in this class. searching in all subArrays of the array for the subArray with sum = target. when 1 thread finds the result, the other thread stops immidiately.
